■Customers total time spent at
the front counter must not go
ove 3m 30s.
■The line at the front counter
needs to keep moving without
getting stuck on one person.

■The cashier/order taker stays
at the counter, ready to welcome
the next customer.

■Backup personnel must quickly
assembly the orders to keep the
line moving forward.
■It is critical for both teams
to work together.
